wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Sisson  (born 1862) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1885 and 1886, playing 3 matches and scoring 4 goals. He played his first match on 11  April 1885 against Ireland as part of the 1885 British Home Championship. He scored a hat-trick of 3 goals and Wales won the match by 8–2. He played his last match for Wales on 10 April 1886 against Scotland.
